questions.question: $$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 0 \quad and \quad x2 = 1 $$ $$ x3 = \frac{x1 + x2}{2} $$ $$\text{equation } =  cos(x)-x × exp(x) $$ $$\text{What is function value of 5th iteration using Secant method?}$$

$$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 0 \quad and \quad x2 = 1 $$ $$ x3 = \frac{x1 + x2}{2} $$ $$\text{equation } =  cos(x)-x × exp(x) $$ $$\text{What is root value of 5th iteration using Secant method?}$$
